translation.en: [officer 1, on radio] 3654. We have foot pursuit outside of PNC Park.
[officer 2] 3169, here on Stockton Avenue. Heading down.
translation.de: 3169 an der Stockton Avenue. Auf dem Weg runter.

translation.en: [officer 3] 438972. Suspect description, black jacket, black pants.
translation.de: 438972. Verdächtige Person: schwarze Jacke, schwarze Hose.

translation.en: [officer 4] Mayor requests we lock down. Lock it down on all four corners.
[officer 3] Copy.
[officer 5] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.de: Person zu Fuß. Wiederhole, Person zu Fuß.

translation.en: [officer 6] Can we confirm present location of suspect?
[officer 5] Got eyes on the suspect. Following.
[officer 7] Dispatch, 3227. Be advised, suspect is entering PNC Park.
translation.de: Zentrale, 3227. Verdächtige Person betritt den PNC Park.

translation.en: [officer 8] Suspect carrying backpack moving through PNC.
translation.de: Unbekannte Person mit verdächtigem Rucksack im PNC.

translation.en: [officer 9] On the move!
[officer 10] Clear the area! Get out of my way!
translation.de: Haben wir Verstärkung von oben? Ich bin vor Ort.

translation.en: -[officer 11, on radio] I'm on-site. -[officer 12] Move!
translation.de: Haben wir Verstärkung von oben? Ich bin vor Ort. Bewegung!

translation.en: [officer 13, on radio] Unit One-Two. I got your call. Negative.
We have no visual. We have got no ID at this time.
[officer 14, on radio] Suspect is on the roof.
Officers in pursuit.
[officer 12] Ray!
Just come with me, okay?
I'm here to help.
translation.de: Ich bin hier, um zu helfen.

translation.en: It's over.
Just…
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
No, no, no, no!
[Ray, echoing] The past is like a dream.
translation.de: Die Vergangenheit ist wie ein Traum.

translation.en: -[birds singing] -[water flowing]
[Ray] There are memories that shape us,
translation.de: Es gibt Erinnerungen, die uns prägen

translation.en: molding us into what we've become.
translation.de: und zu dem formen, was wir geworden sind.

translation.en: A mosaic of images and feelings
translation.de: Ein Mosaik aus Bildern und Gefühlen,

translation.en: that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.de: die etwas Wahrheit bieten, wieso wir hier sind.

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time. Sit down.
translation.de: Auch wenn Details mit der Zeit verblassen.

translation.en: -You know this is all yours? -[Young Rachel chuckles]
What ya lookin' at, man?
I'm lookin' at you, woman.
-I love you. -[Young Rachel] Love you too.
[Ray] As the years pass, we realize
translation.de: Im Laufe der Jahre wird uns klar,

translation.en: we are nothing more than the experiences that made us.
translation.de: wir sind nur die Erfahrungen, die uns prägten.

translation.en: -[doctor] Hi, Amanda. -Hi.
-[Ray] Doc. -[doctor] Mr. Cooper.
Is it back?
[doctor] Yes. We'll go over the options,
translation.de: Ja. Wir können die Optionen besprechen,

translation.en: but Infirmam is still the most effective way to cure this type of cancer.
translation.de: aber Infirmam ist weiter am effektivsten bei der Krebsart.

translation.en: We've already leveraged everything.
[Ray] The pain has brought us closer together.
And watching her grow… has been to find myself again.
translation.de: Und ihr beim Wachsen zuzusehen, ließ mich mich selbst wiederfinden.

translation.en: [all] Surprise!
Here, mama. This is for you.
I mean, it's not much, but it's all they had at the gift shop.
translation.de: Es ist nicht viel, aber es gab nur das im Souvenirladen.

translation.en: -Oh. -[Amanda] Her name is Paloma.
No, it's perfect. Thank you, Mom.
translation.de: -Sie heißt Paloma. -Mom, das ist perfekt. Danke, Mom.

translation.en: [Ray] But sometimes I wonder,
"Are these my memories,
or are they hers?"
-[Ray grunting] -[coach] Put your hips into it. Again.
-[Ray grunts] Ooh. -[laughs] Ooh, that was clean.
-Lock that wrist so it don't get weak. -It won't!
There are no rules in a fight, people do not-- -Whoa! -Fight fair!
translation.de: -Es gibt keine Regeln in einem Kampf und… -Keiner kämpft fair.

translation.en: -[both grunt] -[Ray] How do you win an unfair fight?
translation.de: Wie gewinnt man einen unfairen Kampf?

translation.en: -[Rachel] You always fight harder. -That's right.
[man] Let me train her, Coop. She's got what it takes.
translation.de: Ich trainiere sie, Coop. Sie kann es.

translation.en: -That's my sweet girl. -[laughs]
-[Rachel] Done. -Done?
Thank you, baby.
[Ray] Parents and their children.
Where do we stop and they begin?
translation.de: Wo hören wir auf, und wo beginnen sie?

translation.en: -Doc. -I have good news.
We just got word
translation.de: Wir erfuhren von einem sehr effektiven Infirmam-Generikum

translation.en: a very effective generic version of Infirmam, called Spero,
translation.de: Wir erfuhren von einem sehr effektiven Infirmam-Generikum namens Spero, das die finale FDA-Zulassung durchläuft.

translation.en: is in the final stages of FDA approval.
translation.de: namens Spero, das die finale FDA-Zulassung durchläuft.

translation.en: [softly] This is great news, Ray.
Did you do this?
-You did, didn't you? -[Rachel] What?
This was your birthday wish, wasn't it? [kisses]
I love you. Let's go tell Mom.
translation.de: Ich liebe dich. Sagen wir es Mom.

translation.en: We were supposed to start a new medication.
translation.de: Was ist mit dem neuen Medikament?

translation.en: You know when that's supposed to happen?
I… You'll have to talk with Dr. Wu.
translation.de: Ich… Sie müssen mit Dr. Wu reden.

translation.en: [Rachel] Dad, what's happening?
[Ray] Dr. Wu?
-[Wu] Hi, Ray. -What's goin' on?
translation.de: Hi, Ray. Was ist los? Sie sagten, Amanda würde Spero bald bekommen.

translation.en: You said Amanda was gonna start Spero soon.
translation.de: Was ist los? Sie sagten, Amanda würde Spero bald bekommen.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Amanda's on my list of patients to see.
The company that makes the generic drug
translation.de: Die Firma, die das Generikum herstellt,

translation.en: pulled it off the market.
What are you talkin' about?
BioPrime, the makers of Infirmam,
paid the manufacturer to delay Spero's release.
translation.de: bezahlten die Spero-Hersteller, die Zulassung zu verzögern.

translation.en: -Delay? -For how long?
Indefinitely.
Ray. You told me that my wife was gonna be okay.
I am delivering the same news to three other patients today…
translation.de: Drei weitere Patienten erhalten heute dieselbe Nachricht,

translation.en: [quietly] …two of them kids.
I am so sorry.
I'm sorry.
-[news fanfare plays] -[host] Welcome back. For those just joining, I'm here with BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.de: Willkommen zurück. Bei mir sind BioPrime-CEO Simon Keeley

translation.en: and Congresswoman Diana Morgan of Pennsylvania.
translation.de: und Kongressabgeordnete Diana Morgan aus Pennsylvania.

translation.en: Congresswoman Morgan, why are you here today?
translation.de: Abgeordnete Morgan, warum sind Sie heute hier?

translation.en: Well, I've always taken a hard line against pharmaceutical lobbies and mass corporations, like BioPrime.
translation.de: Mein Kampf galt stets Pharma-Lobbys und Großkonzernen wie BioPrime.

translation.en: With all due respect, Congresswoman,
BioPrime is unlike any other pharmaceutical company in the world.
translation.de: BioPrime ist anders als jedes andere Pharmaunternehmen.

translation.en: -[TV volume raises] -[Keeley] Our scientists have created the most effective treatments in the fight against cancer.
translation.de: Unsere Wissenschaftler haben die effektivsten Krebstherapien entwickelt.

translation.en: Specifically with Infirmam, a drug that has increased life expectancy
translation.de: Insbesondere Infirmam, ein Medikament, das die Lebenserwartung

translation.en: in 86% of patients treated.
Mr. Keeley, it is not the efficacy that's in question.
translation.de: Mr. Keeley, es geht nicht um die Wirkung,

translation.en: It's the business practices. It's the company's business practices.
I believe that we all have a basic human right to safe, affordable medication.
translation.de: Ich glaube, wir haben ein Grundrecht auf sichere, bezahlbare Medikamente.

translation.en: Yeah. Um, this talking point of health care as a human right.
Our medicines, they are a matter of research and science.
translation.de: Unsere Medikamente sind Gegenstand von Forschung und Wissenschaft.

translation.en: The investment is not only risky, it is extremely expensive.
translation.de: Die Investition ist nicht nur riskant, sondern auch extrem teuer.

translation.en: [Langley] All right. We have eager callers that wanna weigh in.
translation.de: Ok. Wir haben ein paar ungeduldige Anrufer.

translation.en: [caller] Can you please explain? Because I just don't understand.
translation.de: Können Sie mir das bitte erklären?

translation.en: It's crazy that a pill can cost that much.
translation.de: Es ist verrückt, dass eine Pille so viel kostet.

translation.en: -Yeah, this is, uh, a tricky issue. -[line ringing]
translation.de: Ja, das ist ein heikles Thema.

translation.en: Uh, and don't get fooled by the talking points of… of politicians from Washington.
translation.de: Und lassen Sie sich nicht von Politikern aus Washington täuschen.

translation.en: Mr. Keeley, according to your own internal documents,
translation.de: Mr. Keeley, nach Ihren eigenen Unterlagen

translation.en: the cost of an entire course of treatment is only four dollars.
translation.de: belaufen sich die Behandlungskosten auf nur vier Dollar.

translation.en: You're absolutely right. A… A course of treatment is four dollars.
translation.de: Da haben Sie recht. Eine Behandlung kostet vier Dollar.

translation.en: But it's funny how you failed to mention the billions of dollars spent on…
translation.de: Aber Sie erwähnen nicht die Milliarden Dollar für…

translation.en: -[operator] Your name? -Ray Cooper.
…rebates, discounts, insurance companies, wholesalers. Look,
I'm here because BioPrime
is committed to healing the world.
translation.de: entschlossen ist, die Welt zu heilen.

translation.en: And if you look at the numbers, that is exactly what we're doing.
translation.de: Und die Zahlen belegen genau das.

translation.en: -[scoffs] That is not what you are doing. -All right.
Just to interject, our next caller is from Pittsburgh.
translation.de: Der nächste Anrufer ist aus Pittsburgh.

translation.en: Ray, do you have something to say to Mr. Keeley?
translation.de: Möchten Sie Mr. Keeley etwas sagen?

translation.en: My wife is dying in a hospital because you pulled Spero off the market.
translation.de: Meine Frau liegt im Sterben, weil Sie Spero vom Markt nahmen.

translation.en: Paying competitors to shelve generic brands of drugs?
translation.de: Konkurrenten bezahlen, damit sie Generika zurückstellen?

translation.en: [scoffs] That is immoral, Mr. Keeley.
Well… [clears throat] …Ray…
Is it-- Should-- Can I? Uh, I just wanna talk to Ray directly.
translation.de: Darf ich… Ich möchte mit Ray sprechen.

translation.en: Listen.
Uh, first of all, I'd just like to say I'm so sorry
translation.de: Zuerst möchte ich sagen, dass es mir leidtut,

translation.en: to hear about your wife.
Uh, believe it or not, BioPrime is dedicated to saving lives.
translation.de: Ob Sie es glauben oder nicht, BioPrime will Leben retten.

translation.en: Saving lives? You're geared towards makin' a profit.
translation.de: Leben retten? Sie wollen nur Profit machen.

translation.en: We've already refinanced our house. I've taken every double shift I can get.
translation.de: Unser Haus wurde umgeschuldet. Ich übernehme jede Doppelschicht.

translation.en: You've already taken everything from me!
[Keeley] Ray, the sad reality is that cancer
translation.de: Ray, die traurige Realität ist, dass Krebs

translation.en: is still very often a death sentence.
translation.de: immer noch oft ein Todesurteil ist.

translation.en: In the short term, what would we give?
[hesitates] What is the cost
of spending just a little bit more time with a loved one?
translation.de: etwas mehr Zeit mit einem geliebten Menschen zu verbringen?

translation.en: A year, a… a month, a day?
translation.de: Ein Jahr, einen Monat, einen Tag?

translation.en: Mmm, it's impossible to put a price on.
If my wife dies,
it's your death sentence.
I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.de: Ich jage und töte Sie mit bloßen Händen.

translation.en: [Rachel] Dad?
[weakly] What ya lookin' at, man?
[softly] I'm lookin' at you, woman.
Oh God!
[shouting] No!
Fuck, no!
Amanda, no!
[softly] Bye.
-[Ray] Ah, God damn it. -[Rachel] What? Hospital bill?
Just… put it at the bottom of the pile.
-We can't ignore it. -[Rachel] Sure you can.
translation.de: Ignorieren bringt nichts. Doch. Wir stimmten für medizinische Grundversorgung.

translation.en: -[stove clicks] -We voted for universal health care. Just…
translation.de: Doch. Wir stimmten für medizinische Grundversorgung. So beziehen wir politisch Stellung.

translation.en: tell 'em we're taking a political stance.
No, we are not eating that three nights in a row.
translation.de: Nein, wir essen das nicht drei Nächte hintereinander.

translation.en: -C'mon. You know you love this too. -[Ray] It's not happening.
translation.de: Du liebst das Zeug doch. Vergiss es. Wir bestellen etwas mit Gemüse.

translation.en: We're gonna order something with vegetables.
translation.de: Vergiss es. Wir bestellen etwas mit Gemüse.

translation.en: -[Rachel laughing] -Fries do not count.
-[Rachel] Hey! -No. Stop.
-Ah! Stop ticklin' me. -[cell phone vibrates]
[Ray chuckles] Stop it.
-Hello? -[man on phone] Ray Cooper?
My name is Martin Bennett. I'm a journalist for VICE.
translation.de: Ich bin Martin Bennett. Journalist für Vice.

translation.en: I'm doing a story on BioPrime, and I saw your call with Simon Keeley on TV.
translation.de: Ich schreibe etwas zu BioPrime und sah Ihren Anruf in der Sendung.

translation.en: [Ray] What do you want?
I can help you get justice for what happened to your wife.
translation.de: Ich kann helfen, dass Ihre Frau Gerechtigkeit bekommt.

translation.en: No, you can't. I've been down that road.
translation.de: Können Sie nicht. Ich versuchte es bereits.

translation.en: I have proof that crimes have been committed.
Crimes that can land some very powerful people in jail.
translation.de: Die mächtige Leute ins Gefängnis bringen können.

translation.en: -Keeley? -Who's that?
Especially Keeley. We need to talk in person.
translation.de: Vor allem Keeley. Wir müssen persönlich reden.

translation.en: -You can talk now. Now you have me. -Not over the phone.
translation.de: -Reden Sie jetzt. Ich höre. -Nicht am Telefon.

translation.en: Meet me at Gateway Station in 20 minutes. I won't waste your time.
translation.de: In 20 Minuten an der Gateway Station. Es wird sich lohnen.

translation.en: -[call disconnects] -[Rachel] Who was that?
[Ray] I'll be right back.
What do you want? Chinese or Subway?
translation.de: Was willst du? Chinesisch oder Subway?

translation.en: No, it's cool. I'll come with you, and we can pick it up on the way.
translation.de: Ich komme mit, und wir holen es unterwegs ab.

translation.en: Not gonna happen, Rae. Sit there and finish that homework.
[Rachel] That's not fair.
Life's not fair.
Chinese?
Lock the door behind me.
translation.de: Schließ die Tür hinter mir ab.

translation.en: -I love you. -Love you. [sighs]
[Ray] Excuse me.
Yeah, I'm here. Where are you?
translation.de: Ja, ich bin hier. Wo sind Sie?

translation.en: -[Bennett] Get on the incoming train. -[Ray] You were supposed to meet me here.
translation.de: -Steigen Sie in die Bahn. -Sie wollten mich hier treffen.

translation.en: Trust me, Ray. Just get on the train.
translation.de: Vertrauen Sie mir, Ray. Steigen Sie ein.

translation.en: Are you on the train?
-Yeah. Now what? -Don't hang up. Just stay on the line.
translation.de: -Sind Sie im Zug? -Ja. Was nun? Nicht auflegen. Bleiben Sie dran.

translation.en: Just sit tight.
Get off at this station.
Okay, where now?
There's a woman in a striped coat and a hipster guy with a scarf.
translation.de: Eine Frau in einer gestreiften Jacke und ein Mann mit Schal.

translation.en: -You see where they're headed? -Yeah. To street level.
All right. There's a guy in a denim jacket going up the stairs.
translation.de: Ok. Da geht ein Typ in Jeansjacke die Treppe hoch.

translation.en: I want you to follow that guy. Hang back, but don't lose him.
translation.de: Folgen Sie ihm. Mit Abstand, aber nicht verlieren.

translation.en: Stand by.
Head to the south platform
translation.de: Nehmen Sie an der Südplattform die Red Line Richtung Allegheny Station.

translation.en: and take the Red Line towards Allegheny Station. Okay?
translation.de: Nehmen Sie an der Südplattform die Red Line Richtung Allegheny Station. Ok?

translation.en: Stay on the line.
-Bennett? -Yeah. Martin.
translation.de: -Bennett? -Ja. Das mit den Zügen tut mir leid, eine Vorsichtsmaßnahme.

translation.en: Look, sorry about all this train hopping, but it's just a precaution.
translation.de: Das mit den Zügen tut mir leid, eine Vorsichtsmaßnahme.

translation.en: Okay, honestly,
I'm a little afraid of how deep this thing might go.
translation.de: -habe ich Angst, wie weit das reicht. -Was bedeutet das?

translation.en: I got a source who told me about BioPrime's payouts
translation.de: Eine Quelle berichtete mir von BioPrime-Geldern

translation.en: to multiple offshore shell corporations.
Bribery, cover-ups, who knows what else. All this leads to Simon Keeley.
translation.de: Bestechung, Vertuschungen und mehr. Alles weist auf Simon Keeley hin.

translation.en: There are other players at both the state and federal level.
translation.de: Es gibt andere Akteure auf Staats- und Bundesebene,

translation.en: But recently, communication went silent.
translation.de: aber in letzter Zeit herrscht Totenstille.

translation.en: You told me you had proof.
[Bennett] Enough to tie Keeley to bribes that pulled Spero off the market.
translation.de: Ich hatte genug, um Keeley mit Bestechung in Verbindung zu bringen.

translation.en: But without my source, I can't connect the dots. You're wastin' my time.
translation.de: -Aber kein Beweis ohne meine Quelle. -Sie vergeuden meine Zeit.

translation.en: [Bennett] I have enough to bring public concern against BioPrime, but I do not have enough to take them down.
translation.de: Ich kann BioPrime öffentlich anprangern, aber nicht schlagen.

translation.en: That's why I need you, your story.
-I just-- -Look, just think about it.
Look, "Local family gets ravaged by Big Pharma's greed."
translation.de: "Gier der Big Pharma ruiniert ansässige Familie."

translation.en: [Bennett] You gotta help me, Ray.
Family, human interest. That's what grabs headlines.
translation.de: Familie. Menschliche Schicksale. Das sind Schlagzeilen.

translation.en: We can blow this thing wide open.
We can take down BioPrime. We can bring Simon Keeley to his knees.
translation.de: Wir können BioPrime ausschalten. Keeley in die Knie zwingen.

translation.en: -Hey! -[blade swishes]
Run!
[groans] Rachel. Rachel, baby, are you okay? Look at me.
translation.de: Rachel. Baby, geht es dir gut? Sieh mich an.

translation.en: -[coach] Just like your dad. -[Rachel grunting]
-Not about strength. -[both grunting]
Okay, top. Top. Up, up, up!
Hands up. Hands up. Move.
Again. Hit him again. Control him. Let's go.
Come on. You can take anyone.
Beautiful. There it is.
Nice. Top, top, top, top! Watch the scramble.
All right.
Hooks in. Get it. Get him in. Here.
Pick your shots.
That's it. Open him up.
-[both grunt] -[coach] You got it. Lock it in.
Beautiful.
Just hold. Hold, hold.
[coach] He's tapping, Rachel.
Rachel, he's tapping.
-He's tapping, Rachel. Rachel! -[sounds fading]
[coach] Rachel!
[coach] Rachel!
Today, I am thrilled to announce a bipartisan bill
translation.de: Ich kündige mit Freude einen überparteilichen Gesetzentwurf an,

translation.en: that will make true progress in the war to find a cure for cancer.
In collaboration with the CDC and the NIH,
translation.de: In Zusammenarbeit mit CDC und NIH

translation.en: we are creating a strategic partnership with BioPrime Pharmaceuticals.
translation.de: kommt es zur strategischen Partnerschaft mit BioPrime Pharmaceuticals.

translation.en: Thanks to the effort of BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.de: Dank der Bemühungen von BioPrime-CEO Simon Keeley

translation.en: and chairman, Vinod Shah,
this bill will effectively cap the cost of treatment.
translation.de: wird dieser Gesetzentwurf die Behandlungskosten eingrenzen.

translation.en: Finally, many of BioPrime's breakthrough treatments
translation.de: Viele der bahnbrechenden Medikamente von BioPrime,

translation.en: that used to cost in the hundreds of thousands of dollars
will now be available to the public at affordable prices.
translation.de: stehen der Öffentlichkeit nun zu fairen Preisen zur Verfügung.

translation.en: I told the American people that I would hold companies like BioPrime accountable,
translation.de: Ich sagte, dass ich Firmen wie BioPrime zur Rechenschaft ziehen würde,

translation.en: and I have delivered on that promise.
We are cleaning out the rot.
translation.de: Wir reißen die faulen Stellen heraus.

translation.en: [Ray] Again?
I wasn't watching it. You were.
translation.de: Ich habe nicht geguckt. Du schon.

translation.en: I had a dream last night about that trip we took with Mom in the woods.
translation.de: Ich träumte letzte Nacht von der Reise mit Mom im Wald.

translation.en: My memory's kind of fading of her.
I don't know. It's like I'm losing these tiny pieces of her every day, and I just…
translation.de: Als würde ich täglich diese kleinen Details zu ihr verlieren und…

translation.en: I don't know. I miss her. I miss our family.
translation.de: Ich vermisse sie und unsere Familie.

translation.en: Me too.
I miss her too.
What are you planning to do?
I just need to make sense of this.
-I need to know. -Just… Just leave it alone, okay?
translation.de: -Ich muss es wissen. -Lass… Lass es einfach, ok?

translation.en: They already investigated, and they didn't find anything.
translation.de: Sie haben ermittelt und nichts gefunden.

translation.en: Or the guy who tried to kill you. It just was a dead-end conspiracy.
translation.de: Oder der Typ, der dich umbringen wollte. Nur eine Verschwörungstheorie.

translation.en: -I don't believe that. -[Rachel sighs]
You don't believe that.
I need to try.
Keep it close, Mike. -I don't know how long I'll be. -[Mike] Yes, sir.
translation.de: Bleib hier. Ich weiß nicht, wie lange es dauert.

translation.en: -Mr. Keeley. -Ah.
Appreciate it. -Don't let me go dry tonight, will you? -[server chuckles]
translation.de: Danke. Bringen Sie gerne immer Nachschub.

translation.en: [announcer] Good evening. I'm proud to kick off this first annual event
translation.de: Guten Abend. Mit Freude eröffne ich diesen jährlichen Event,

translation.en: by introducing you to the CEO of BioPrime,
translation.de: indem ich Ihnen den CEO von BioPrime vorstelle,

translation.en: [man] Nice to see you, Simon.
Thank you.
Thank you very much. Hello, everyone.
T. S. Eliot said,
"We shall not cease in exploration."
We've joined forces with Goa Capital Partners
translation.de: Wir haben uns mit Goa Capital Partners zusammengetan,

translation.en: in hopes of raising ten million dollars…
For-- That's right. I know you got it.
translation.de: Genau. Ich weiß, ihr habt es.

translation.en: Excuse me.
[Keeley, over speakers] For medicine and assistance…
for children in Africa.
translation.de: AUSSER BETRIEB …für Kinder in Afrika… Indien. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: India. Sorry. [laughs awkwardly]
translation.de: …für Kinder in Afrika… Indien. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: Either way, both places need a lot of help.
translation.de: Wie auch immer, beide Orte brauchen viel Hilfe.

translation.en: -Thanks again for coming. -[guests clap]
Ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Simon Keeley.
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, Mr. Simon Keeley.

translation.en: Simon, Simon, Simon.
India, Africa? Africa, India?
You know what? I am so sick of doing your job for ya.
translation.de: Weißt du was? Ich habe es satt, deinen Job für dich zu machen.

translation.en: I'm doing my job, Simon. Everyone's here because of me.
translation.de: Den mache ich. Alle sind wegen mir hier.

translation.en: There's some important people here.
Might want to mingle with more than your cocktails. Sure, all right. Good to see ya.
translation.de: -Stürz dich nicht nur auf deine Cocktails. -Klar. Schön, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: -[drink spills] -What the fuck?
Who would…?
-[bodyguard 1] Sir? -[Keeley] You kidding? Give me a napkin.
translation.de: -Sir? -Was soll das? Gib mir deine Serviette.

translation.en: …why I agree to participate in this bullshit in the first place.
translation.de: Warum ich überhaupt an diesem Scheiß teilnehme.

translation.en: -[auctioneer] Let's start the auction. -Fucking balls are wet.
translation.de: -Meine Herren, die Auktion beginnt. -Meine Eier sind nass.

translation.en: -[bodyguard 2] It's out of order. -No shit. How'd you figure that out?
translation.de: -Außer Betrieb. -Echt, Sherlock? Wie kommst du darauf?

translation.en: Sir. Sir, there's another bathroom down the stairs.
translation.de: Sir, unten ist noch eine Toilette.

translation.en: [Keeley] Well, let's go to it, then. All right?
translation.de: Na dann mal los. Alles klar?

translation.en: Wait here. Keep a lookout.
-[Ray] Hmm? -What the… fuck? You were warned.
If anything happened to her, I would hunt you down.
All made her suffer, but she died because of you.
translation.de: Alle ließen sie leiden, aber sie starb wegen dir.

translation.en: I didn't kill anyone, you psycho fuck. Cancer did.
translation.de: Ich habe niemanden getötet, Psycho. Das war Krebs.

translation.en: You paid someone to kill Martin Bennett.
-What? Martin? -He was investigating your bribes.
What the… What are you talking about? I don't know any Martin Bennett.
translation.de: Wovon redest du? Ich kenne keinen Martin Bennett.

translation.en: -You're the goddamn CEO of BioPrime. -All right.
translation.de: -Du bist der verdammte CEO von BioPrime. -Ok.

translation.en: I authorize a bribe now and again, but it's not like I read the fine print.
translation.de: Ich erlaube mal Bestechungen, aber ich lese nie das Kleingedruckte.

translation.en: [yelling] Okay, now, stop! Stop!
Fuck!
All right. Uh… [grunts]
It must have been Vinod Shah. Okay?
translation.de: Es muss Vinod Shah gewesen sein. Ok?

translation.en: Nothing happens without his sign-off. He's the one that brought me on, okay?
translation.de: Nichts passiert ohne seine Unterschrift. Er holte mich dazu, ok?

translation.en: You have no idea what you're getting into.
translation.de: Du hast keine Ahnung, worauf du dich einlässt.

translation.en: -Get him. -[tense music playing]
Here. Handle it. Do it!
-[blade slashes] -[bodyguard 2 screams] Fuck!
No!
Come here, you little bitch!
-[Ray exhales shakily] -[auctioneer] Sold! 50,000 dollars.
[Rachel] Dad? You're hurt.
[Ray] I'm fine. I need you to pack up. Only what we need.
translation.de: Mir geht's gut. Du musst packen. Nur das Nötigste.

translation.en: -[Rachel] When are we coming back? -[Ray] We're not.
Is that his blood?
I… I had no choice. He had a gun.
translation.de: Ich hatte keine Wahl. Er hatte eine Waffe.

translation.en: I told you not to do this.
translation.de: Ich sagte, du sollst das nicht tun.

translation.en: People are gonna come after us, aren't they?
[Ray] I don't know.
But we need to go. Please go pack our stuff.
translation.de: Aber wir müssen los. Bitte pack unsere Sachen.

translation.en: [loudly] Go pack!
Mr. Asbury, I'm Special Agent Sarah Meeker.
translation.de: Mr. Asbury, ich bin Special Agent Sarah Meeker.

translation.en: I already gave a statement.
[Meeker] Your partner, he took a bullet to the head tonight.
translation.de: Ihrem Partner wurde heute in den Kopf geschossen.

translation.en: Did you hear any gunshots?
[Asbury] No.
Did you hear anything at all before losing consciousness?
translation.de: Hörten Sie irgendetwas, bevor Sie ohnmächtig wurden?

translation.en: Somethin' about a woman.
Said, uh…
"All of them made her suffer."
-Or… "All made her suffer." I don't know. -What do you mean? All what? All who?
translation.de: "Sie alle ließen sie leiden." Oder… -"Alle ließen sie leiden." Keine Ahnung. -Alle was? Alle wer?

translation.en: -I don't know. -Okay.
-Do you remember anything else? -No.
-[Asbury sighs] -Thank you.
Come on.
But wait.
Whoever it was said they warned him.
translation.de: Wer auch immer es war, hatte ihn gewarnt.

translation.en: They said they'd come for Mr. Keeley if anything happened to the woman.
translation.de: Dass Mr. Keeley dran wäre, wenn der Frau etwas zustieße.

translation.en: All right. Thank you.
Let's do a check on all death threats Keeley may have gotten in the past.
translation.de: Überprüf alle Morddrohungen, die Keeley je erhielt.

translation.en: [agent] You got it.
[Ray] It's a long drive to Toronto on these back roads.
translation.de: Auf den Nebenstraßen dauert es ewig bis Toronto.

translation.en: Especially if we're not talking.
-♪ Who throws the dice ♪ -You gonna come sit up here?
[Rachel grunts softly] Talk to Paloma.
We ran all the Keeley death threats, and we got a match.
translation.de: Wir fanden etwas bei den Keeley-Morddrohungen.

translation.en: Her name is Amanda Cooper. Died at Carnegie Medical a few years back.
translation.de: Sie heißt Amanda Cooper. Verstarb vor ein paar Jahren im Carnegie Medical.

translation.en: Her husband's Oldsmobile was at the auction.
translation.de: Das Oldsmobile ihres Mannes war bei der Auktion.

translation.en: And we found this too.
[Keeley] It's impossible to put a price on.
[Ray] If my wife dies, it's your death sentence.
translation.de: Wenn meine Frau stirbt, ist das Ihr Todesurteil.

translation.en: I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.de: Ich jage und töte Sie mit bloßen Händen.

translation.en: -[Langley] We're gonna take-- -[Meeker hits key] "All made her suffer"?
-Right. [chuckles] -[Meeker exhales]
Let's put an APB out on Cooper's vehicle.
translation.de: Lassen wir nach Coopers Wagen fahnden.

translation.en: [attendant] Here you are.
[man] Got the ID on the driver.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wer das Auto fährt.

translation.en: How do you wanna handle this?
[Ray] Evening.
[Ray] I'll be right up.
-[phone rings] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] You're the agent assigned to what happened at the UNICEF fundraiser.
translation.de: Sie ermitteln wegen der Sache bei der Auktion.

translation.en: If you have any information, please call the tip line.
-An agent will get back to you. -Yeah, I called the tip line.
translation.de: -Ein Agent wird sich melden. -Tat ich bereits.

translation.en: -I told them I'm only talkin' to you. -And who am I speaking to?
translation.de: -Ich sagte, ich rede nur mit Ihnen. -Und mit wem spreche ich?

translation.en: Simon Keeley's death was an accident.
translation.de: Simon Keeleys Tod war ein Unfall.

translation.en: -It was self-defense. -How do you know that? Who is this?
translation.de: Es war Notwehr. Woher wissen Sie das? Wer ist da?

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you everything that happened.
translation.de: Ich sage Ihnen, was passiert ist.

translation.en: If you want a crime, look at…
translation.de: Wenn einer ein Verbrecher ist, dann…

translation.en: look at what Keeley did.
How many cancer patients died because of him? Thousands? More?
translation.de: Wie viele Krebspatienten starben seinetwegen? Tausende? Mehr?

translation.en: Where are you, Rachel?
-Goodbye. -Wait, I can help you.
My dad doesn't know I'm doing this.
He's a good man. He… He just needs help.
translation.de: Er ist ein guter Mann. Er braucht nur Hilfe.

translation.en: Do you need help?
I'm fine.
But I know you think he's guilty.
translation.de: Aber ich weiß, Sie halten ihn für schuldig.

translation.en: You've all made up your minds.
But you're wrong. He's a good, honest man.
translation.de: Aber Sie irren sich. Er ist ein guter, ehrlicher Mann.

translation.en: And I… need him.
He's all I got.
Do you have cash?
Why?
When you can, get to a… a gas station or a Walmart.
translation.de: Wenn möglich, geh zu einer Tankstelle oder zu Walmart.

translation.en: They have disposable phones, a burner.
Okay? You get one, and you call me back.
My number is 412-046-4378.
Okay? No one will be able to trace it. Okay? It's safe.
translation.de: Keiner kann es nachverfolgen. Es ist sicher.

translation.en: Now say it back to me. It's 412-046-4--
-[call disconnects] -[quietly] Fuck.
Where'd you get that?
Did you steal that?
I'm just looking at it.
translation.de: Ich sehe es mir nur an.

translation.en: It's fine.
What? It's not like business is booming down there.
translation.de: Unten boomt es ja kaum geschäftlich.

translation.en: -Twenty dollars? Seriously? -[Rachel sighs] We're not done.
translation.de: Zwanzig Dollar? Im Ernst? Wir sind noch nicht fertig.

translation.en: Look, I know you've always taught me to do the right thing, okay?
translation.de: Du hast mir immer beigebracht, das Richtige zu tun,

translation.en: But we're here because of you.
translation.de: aber wir sind wegen dir hier.

translation.en: Rachel, look at me. Look at me. We gotta go.
translation.de: Rachel, sieh mich an. Wir müssen weg.

translation.en: [Ray] Come on.
-[pounding on door] -[agent] FBI! We have permission to gain entry.
translation.de: FBI! Wir haben die Erlaubnis reinzukommen.

translation.en: [agent] Meeker.
Whoa. We definitely got our suspect.
[Meeker] It's Torres.
You got something?
What?
Where'd this happen?
Yeah, okay. Thank you.
So, that APB we put out on Ray Cooper's vehicle?
translation.de: Die Fahndung nach Ray Coopers Wagen.

translation.en: It was spotted fleeing the scene of a double homicide 70 miles north of here.
translation.de: Er entfernte sich 110 Kilometer nördlich von hier von einem Doppelmord-Tatort.

translation.en: Rae, I don't think I can make it to Toronto.
translation.de: Rae, ich schaffe es nicht nach Toronto.

translation.en: You know those men were sent to kill us.
translation.de: Sie schickten diese Männer, um uns zu töten.

translation.en: I had no choice.
I just hate this.
[man] It runs, if you're askin'.
Like an odds-on favorite at the Kentucky Derby.
translation.de: Wie ein Favorit beim Kentucky Derby.

translation.en: [hit man] You take cash?
[Ray] We need to stay off the road until I figure out what's goin' on.
translation.de: Wir müssen die Straße meiden, bis wir wissen, was los ist.

translation.en: I'm gonna look around.
You wanna come with me?
Okay.
I'll be right back.
If they found us at the motel, they'll find us anywhere.
translation.de: Wenn sie uns im Motel fanden, finden sie uns überall.

translation.en: It's gonna be okay, Rae. I'm gonna keep you safe.
translation.de: Alles wird gut, Rae. Ich werde dich beschützen.

translation.en: They're coming to hurt you.
That's why I need to stop this. It needs to finish.
translation.de: Deshalb muss ich das aufhalten. Es muss enden.

translation.en: [Ray] I have to go after Shah.
[Rachel] You plan on using that?
No, but I need to be ready.
translation.de: Nein, aber ich muss bereit sein.

translation.en: Do you know how to shoot it? It's not a hunting rifle.
translation.de: Weißt du, wie man damit schießt? Das ist kein Jagdgewehr.

translation.en: -[gun cocks] -You know I do, Rae.
So, what is your plan?
It's better to have it and not need it than need it and not have it.
translation.de: Besser, sie zu haben und nicht zu brauchen, als andersherum.

translation.en: We need protection.
Okay, so all the values you taught me growing up are out the window?
translation.de: Ok, alle Werte, die du mir beigebracht hast, sind also vergessen?

translation.en: As long as we're on the same page, dope.
translation.de: Solange wir gleicher Meinung sind, cool.

translation.en: Shit.
-[phone unlocks] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] There are people that are coming after us. Rachel?
I don't know who. I don't know what he's gonna do, but…
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wer oder was er tun wird…

translation.en: Who, your dad?
Look, I've been tryin' to stop him, but I can't.
translation.de: Ich wollte ihn aufhalten, aber sinnlos.

translation.en: The only person he would ever listen to is my mom.
translation.de: Er würde nur auf meine Mom hören.

translation.en: -Can you tell me about her? -She…
translation.de: Magst du mir von ihr erzählen? Sie…

translation.en: She was a dancer.
[sighs] She had, uh…
tendinitis and stress fractures.
My dad, I mean, he sparred with guys who could take a punch.
translation.de: Mein Dad hat mit harten Kerlen geboxt.

translation.en: But you could tell that they were in pain. You saw it. You know?
translation.de: Aber man sah ihnen ihre Schmerzen an. Ganz deutlich. Wissen Sie?

translation.en: But when my mom danced,
she'd just smile.
She always smiled.
She's tough. Like you.
You don't know me.
Debate,
gymnastics, judo junior Olympian, a 3.5 GPA.
You've been checking up on me?
Well, I'm an FBI agent.
I do have one question.
Who is… Paloma?
How do you know about Paloma?
I'm looking at a photo that says "Rachel and Paloma."
translation.de: Ich betrachte ein Foto mit Rachel und Paloma.

translation.en: I… wanted a pet. [sighs]
But we couldn't get one because of my mom's treatments, so…
translation.de: Aber wegen der Behandlungen meiner Mutter war das unmöglich.

translation.en: so she got me a stuffed bunny.
translation.de: Also besorgte sie mir einen Plüschhasen.

translation.en: You…
She was always, uh, looking out for me.
translation.de: Sie hat sich immer um mich gekümmert.

translation.en: Even when she couldn't. [sighs]
translation.de: Selbst, als sie es nicht konnte.

translation.en: You'd make her proud.
And your dad.
[breathing shakily] I don't know what he's gonna do.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was er tun wird.

translation.en: Hey. Listen to me.
You are in control.
Um, but I'm… I'm not. I'm really not.
translation.de: Aber… Habe ich nicht. Wirklich nicht.

translation.en: -You are in control. -Stop saying that.
translation.de: -Du hast die Kontrolle. -Sagen Sie das nicht.

translation.en: You are in control. You are Rachel Cooper.
translation.de: Du hast die Kontrolle. Du bist Rachel Cooper.

translation.en: Say your name.
-Rachel Cooper. -Say it again.
Rachel Cooper. [sighs]
That's it.
Turn the ignition on.
Tur--
What are you doin'?
-[clicks switch] -[Rachel] I'm coming with you.
[Ray] No, you're not.
-[Rachel] I'm not leaving you. -This isn't a debate.
translation.de: -Ich lasse dich nicht alleine. -Das ist keine Debatte.

translation.en: -You can't do this without me. -I am not putting you in danger, Rae.
translation.de: -Ohne mich schaffst du das nicht. -Ich bringe dich nicht in Gefahr.

translation.en: This conversation's over. Get outta the car.
translation.de: Das Gespräch ist vorbei. Steig aus.

translation.en: What about the motel?
That was unplanned. Pump the gas.
translation.de: Das war ungeplant. Tritt aufs Gas.

translation.en: Promise you'll be back. Promise.
translation.de: Versprich mir, dass du zurückkommst. Los.

translation.en: I'll be back.
Pinky swear.
I said, I promise.
Get outta the car.
[sighs] You always say I have to fight harder, so…
translation.de: Du sagst immer, ich muss härter kämpfen, also…

translation.en: What?
[gently] I need you to get outta the car.
Get outta the car.
As long as we're together, we're still a family.
translation.de: Zusammen sind wir noch eine Familie.

translation.en: Okay? So if you can't promise me that we'll be together, then I'm coming with you.
translation.de: Wenn du mir das nicht versprechen kannst, komme ich mit.

translation.en: [Ray] Not this time.
[quietly] Put your seat belt on.
Nice house.
How you gonna get in there?
-I'm not. -[tense music playing]
[Ray] What's this guy doin'?
[Rachel] Look.
[Shah] Okay. Keep an eye on your sister. See you at the airport.
translation.de: Ok. Achte auf deine Schwester. Wir sehen uns am Flughafen.

translation.en: Hold on.
This is Victor One. We've got a flat tire.
translation.de: Hier Victor One. Wir haben einen Platten.

translation.en: Stay behind.
[Shah] What is this?
Something's wrong. Get us out of here.
Forward! Go! Go! Move, move!
Just break through it! Drive!
[driver] Come on! Let's go!
Fuck.
Get me out of here.
-Finish him. -[bodyguard] Go!
[Ray] Rachel, someone else is here. Stay in the car.
translation.de: Rachel, jemand ist hier. Bleib im Auto.

translation.en: You're gonna tell me why Martin Bennett was killed.
translation.de: Sag mir, warum Martin Bennett getötet wurde.

translation.en: There's nowhere to go. We can get to anyone.
translation.de: Es gibt keinen Ausweg. Wir kriegen jeden.

translation.en: You killed a reporter to cover up bribes. Who were they paid out to?
translation.de: Du tötetest den Reporter wegen Bestechungen. An wen?

translation.en: Soon, some powerful people are gonna be looking for a little girl who lost both her parents.
translation.de: Mächtige Leute suchen bald ein Mädchen, das beide Eltern verlor.

translation.en: [Rachel, echoing] Daddy!
-I know there's others. Who are they? -You don't have what it takes.
translation.de: -Es gibt andere. Wer sind sie? -Du hast nicht das Zeug dazu.

translation.en: -[gunshot] -[Ray grunts] Whoa!
[Ray] Go!
-[engine cuts out] -Why can't you just listen?
You should've stayed in the car. You shouldn't have followed me to the subway.
translation.de: Du solltest im Auto bleiben, mir damals nicht in die U-Bahn folgen.

translation.en: That was the man from the subway.
translation.de: Das war der aus der U-Bahn.

translation.en: We have to go.
Let's go.
Look.
-Hold on. -[Rachel] What are you doing?
[Ray, softly] Sit down.
If anything goes wrong, you tell them everything.
translation.de: Wenn etwas schiefgeht, sagst du ihnen alles.

translation.en: Your business with me is done.
translation.de: Du musst mich nicht mehr jagen.

translation.en: Shah's dead.
Hmm. Shah didn't hire me.
My contract is to take out anyone who can implicate my employer.
translation.de: Mein Vertrag besagt, jeden auszuschalten, der meinem Arbeitgeber schadet.

translation.en: Who else are you hunting?
Only the one sitting next to me.
Something for you, darling?
No.
I know your struggle.
I do.
The village I grew up in,
translation.de: Ich wuchs in einem Dorf auf,

translation.en: we were farmers.
I worked in the fields with my father.
translation.de: Ich arbeitete mit meinem Vater auf dem Feld.

translation.en: And one day, a group of rebels came.
translation.de: Eines Tages kam eine Gruppe Rebellen.

translation.en: They slaughtered my entire village. Everyone. Whole family, friends.
translation.de: Sie haben mein ganzes Dorf abgeschlachtet. Alle. Die ganze Familie, Freunde.

translation.en: I was able to hide in the weeds.
translation.de: Ich konnte mich im Unkraut verstecken.

translation.en: Now, you gotta understand, I was just a kid, know that?
translation.de: Du musst verstehen, ich war noch ein Kind.

translation.en: In such pain, with such… rage
translation.de: Ich spürte so viel Schmerz, so viel…

translation.en: that for years, I hunted them one by one.
-Then you understand. -[hit man] I do.
You see, what I've learned in that process is that there will always be an opposing force.
translation.de: Ich habe dabei gelernt, dass es immer eine gegnerische Macht geben wird.

translation.en: No amount of revenge can change that.
translation.de: Keine Rache der Welt kann das ändern.

translation.en: So you see, in this case,
you are my village,
and I am the opposing force.
translation.de: und ich bin die gegnerische Macht.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Well, there's three ways this goes down.
One, I tell those cops who we are
translation.de: Eins, ich sage den Cops, wer wir sind,

translation.en: and this gets real ugly for both of us.
translation.de: dann wird es für uns beide hässlich.

translation.en: Two,
I walk out the front door,
spend the rest of my life hiding in the four corners of this earth, and neither of us get what we want.
translation.de: und verstecke mich mein Leben lang, keiner von uns bekommt, was er will.

translation.en: Or three,
you tell me who hired you.
We both know I'm gonna go after them.
translation.de: Wir wissen beide, dass ich sie jage.

translation.en: And when I do,
you can try to take another shot at me.
translation.de: kannst du mich noch mal bekämpfen.

translation.en: This way,
at least one of us gets what we want.
translation.de: einer von uns, was er will.

translation.en: Nah.
No, you've killed a few men, but…
translation.de: Nein, du hast ein paar getötet, aber…

translation.en: their deaths are still fresh in your eyes.
translation.de: Ihr Tod ist noch zu frisch für dich.

translation.en: You're a dilettante in my world.
translation.de: Du bist ein Dilettant in meiner Welt.

translation.en: I never set out to kill anyone.
Not like you.
You are not innocent.
You knew going after powerful people was a dangerous business.
translation.de: Du wusstest, dass es gefährlich ist, sich mit Mächtigen anzulegen.

translation.en: You jumped. I'm just the pavement closing in.
translation.de: Du bist drauf zugerast. Ich bin nur der nahende Bürgersteig.

translation.en: The person you're looking for.
The senator.
See you in Pittsburgh.
I'll see ya soon.
Rothman, you have kids.
Does the idea of Rachel Cooper
being dragged through all of this bother you at all?
translation.de: dass Rachel Cooper da mit reingezogen wird?

translation.en: Every case we work has me worried about my kids one way or another.
translation.de: Bei jedem Fall mache ich mir Sorgen um meine Kinder.

translation.en: I keep thinking about her.
I mean, how's…
how's a kid supposed to get past all that she's seen?
translation.de: wie soll ein Kind all das überwinden, was es gesehen hat?

translation.en: I feel like…
I feel like I need to protect her somehow.
translation.de: Ich habe das Gefühl, dass ich sie beschützen muss.

translation.en: -Just do the work-- -[agent] Memo came through.
-Search crew found Cooper's vehicle. -Where?
[agent] In the woods, 20 miles outside Shah's compound.
translation.de: Im Wald, 30 km vor Shahs Grundstück.

translation.en: Looks like local PD got a call this morning that a tow truck was stolen at a nearby location.
translation.de: Der örtlichen Polizei wurde gemeldet, dass ein Abschleppwagen geklaut wurde.

translation.en: We need eyes on all street cameras on Route 8.
-[agent] I'm on it. -Thank you.
Okay. Fort Pitt Tunnel. Only 12 minutes away.
translation.de: Ok. Fort Pitt Tunnel, nur 12 Minuten entfernt.

translation.en: War room.
Hey, guys. We got a hit on that tow truck. It's headed back to the city.
translation.de: Treffer beim Abschleppwagen. Fährt zurück in die Stadt.

translation.en: [dispatcher 1, on radio] Suspect is in a red tow truck. 10-80.
License plate Romeo Tango One Seven
Uniform Alpha Sierra.
[officer 1] We may have something here. Westbound on Liberty passing 16th.
translation.de: Wir haben vielleicht etwas. Richtung Westen auf Liberty über 16th.

translation.en: [Rachel] The chopper! It's on us.
[officer 1] We've got eyes on the suspect. Making a right turn on 9th.
translation.de: Wir sehen verdächtige Person. Biegt rechts ab an der 9th.

translation.en: North on 9th. Picking up speed. Making a run for it.
All right. Hold on, baby.
[Rachel] Oh shit!
[officer 2, over speaker] Police! Stop the vehicle now!
-Where's the chopper? -It's on your right. On your right.
-Get outta the way! -[people scream]
Oh shit!
-God damn it! Hold on. Hang on! -[Rachel screams]
[dispatcher 1, on radio] All units, suspect is armed and dangerous.
translation.de: Alle Einheiten. Person ist bewaffnet und gefährlich.

translation.en: I repeat, armed and dangerous.
[Ray] The game's letting out.
[quietly] Oh shit!
-[dispatcher 2] Got eyes on the suspect. -[officer 3] On the move!
translation.de: Wir sehen die verdächtige Person. Weiter in Bewegung.

translation.en: [officer 4, on radio] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.de: Person zu Fuß. Ich wiederhole, zu Fuß.

translation.en: [dispatcher 2] Suspect is entering PNC Park.
-[Meeker] Everybody clear. FBI! -[Rothman] Move! Out of the way!
[Meeker] If he's down here, we squeeze him out. I'll take the upper level.
translation.de: Unten kriegen wir das hin. Ich gehe hoch.

translation.en: PPD, cover this level. The rest, go upstairs.
translation.de: PPD übernimmt diese Ebene. Rest geht hoch.

translation.en: -[officer 5] Suspect spotted. -[crowd cheering]
Suspect spotted on the upper level.
Get me agents to the roof, now!
[Rothman] Move!
-[officer 7] I got eyes on. -[Rothman] Copy.
[Meeker] Wait!
Wait.
Okay. [gasps]
It wasn't right what happened to you. I understand that.
translation.de: Was dir widerfuhr, war falsch. Ich verstehe das.

translation.en: Look, no one is gonna hurt you. It's me. I'm here to help.
translation.de: Niemand wird dir etwas antun. Ich bin hier, um zu helfen.

translation.en: Okay?
-[somber music playing] -I don't know you.
Yes, you do. We've…
We've been talking.
No. Paloma.
You told me your stuffed bunny's name was Paloma.
translation.de: Du hast mir gesagt, dass dein Hase Paloma heißt.

translation.en: Remember?
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
[Meeker] Your father was a good man.
translation.de: Dein Vater war ein guter Mann.

translation.en: [Meeker] You are not him.
-[Meeker] Say your name. -[Rachel gasps]
[Meeker] You are in control.
[sighs] Fuck.
You're nothing but a scared little--
translation.de: Du bist nur eine verängstigte, kleine…

translation.en: [hit man] Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
[echoing] Say your name.
[Ray, echoing] Rachel.
We're gonna be okay.
[Meeker] He shouldn't have been killed.
translation.de: Er hätte nicht getötet werden sollen.

translation.en: Come on, just… say… your name.
[Meeker] Just say your name!
Yeah.
[dispatcher 2] We have a positive identification of the suspect. Her name is Rachel Cooper.
translation.de: Verdächtige ist identifiziert. Sie heißt Rachel Cooper.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, Rachel!
[Meeker] Her name is Rachel Cooper.
Eighteen years of age.
[paramedic] Any family to contact?
[Meeker] Both parents deceased.
[driver] No!
[Meeker] Rachel, stop!
There you are.
I'm scared.
I feel like the whole world's gone crazy.
translation.de: Die ganze Welt dreht irgendwie durch.

translation.en: Or maybe it's just me.
I'm tired.
Nobody cares about stopping them.
Besides me.
Will I ever get to see you and Mom again?
translation.de: Werde ich dich und Mom je wiedersehen?

translation.en: [softly] We're with you now.
[Morgan] The fight begins here.
Big business and corporate interests have corroded our politics.
translation.de: Großunternehmen und Firmeninteressen haben unsere Politik unterwandert.

translation.en: [Morgan] And I believe that our country is on the verge of imploding.
translation.de: Und ich glaube, unser Land steht kurz vor dem Zusammenbruch.

translation.en: Of rotting. Rotting from the inside out.
translation.de: Vor dem Verfaulen. Verfaulen von innen nach außen.

translation.en: [Morgan] We need someone who will clean…
translation.de: Wir brauchen jemanden, der die faulen Stellen…

translation.en: [Morgan and crowd] …out the rot! -Clean out the rot! -[crowd cheers]
Today, I am announcing my bid
to be your next senator from the great state of Pennsylvania.
translation.de: als nächste Senatorin des großartigen Staates Pennsylvania.

translation.en: [chuckles] That's right.
And to big business politics,
we have one thing to say.
This is our state,
and it is not for sale!
translation.de: und er steht nicht zum Verkauf!

translation.en: [staffer] Well done.
Entering the race is just the beginning.
translation.de: Das Rennen ist erst der Anfang.

translation.en: Let's focus on what we wanna do when we win.
translation.de: Wichtiger ist, was wir tun, wenn wir gewinnen.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Ray] Where'd you get this?
-It's Mom's. -[Ray chuckles]
Actually, it's mine.
I took your mom to a Steelers game shortly after we met,
translation.de: Als wir zusammenkamen, waren wir bei einem Steelers-Spiel,

translation.en: and it was freezing, and I gave her my jacket. And she never gave it back.
translation.de: es war eiskalt, ich gab ihr meine Jacke. Sie gab sie mir nie zurück.

translation.en: Well, now it's my turn to steal it from her.
translation.de: Nun, jetzt klaue ich sie ihr.

translation.en: [Rachel] It's my turn to steal it from her.
[Ray] Come on, baby.
Get up.
[Ray, emphatically] Get up, sweet girl.
[Rachel] Calling the FBI.
And when they get here,
you're gonna tell them everything you did with BioPrime.
translation.de: erzählen Sie alles, was Sie mit BioPrime trieben.

translation.en: Go ahead. Or better yet, let me.
translation.de: Sag schon. Oder besser, lass mich.

translation.en: I think the FBI is looking for you, Rachel.
translation.de: Ich glaube, das FBI sucht dich, Rachel.

translation.en: You know me?
You're all over the news.
I've seen what you did.
[Morgan] You bring the FBI here, and…
translation.de: Du holst das FBI hierher, und…

translation.en: who do you think they're gonna arrest?
-The crazy girl who killed five men? -No.
translation.de: Das irre Mädchen, das fünf Männer getötet hat? Oder mich?

translation.en: -[Morgan] Or me? -No. We never meant to hurt anyone.
translation.de: Das irre Mädchen, das fünf Männer getötet hat? Oder mich? Nein. Wir wollten niemandem schaden.

translation.en: I understand, and I can help you.
translation.de: Ich verstehe das und kann dir helfen.

translation.en: I think I'm the only one who can.
translation.de: Ich denke, nur ich kann das.

translation.en: -I can make this nightmare end. -Shut up!
-You're the one behind BioPrime. -I wrestled them into submission.
translation.de: -Sie stecken hinter BioPrime. -Ich habe sie besiegt.

translation.en: I got them to lower their prices. Affordable treatment.
translation.de: Sie senkten die Preise. Bezahlbare Behandlung.

translation.en: And you cleaned out the rot. I'm fighting for you, sweetheart.
translation.de: -Sie rissen die faulen Stellen raus. -Ich kämpfe für dich, Süße.

translation.en: When I saw you on CNN when my mom was in the hospital,
translation.de: Als ich Sie auf CNN sah, als meine meine Mom im Krankenhaus lag…

translation.en: I thought you could actually save her.
I believed in you.
-[shakily] You still can. -How?
[inhales sharply] I know people at the DOJ. They can make the charges against you go away.
translation.de: Ich kenne Leute im Justizministerium. Sie können die Anklagen fallenlassen.

translation.en: And you can have a life.
What you've been through, what happened to you, was wrong, Rachel.
translation.de: Was du durchgemacht hast, was dir widerfuhr, war falsch, Rachel.

translation.en: The trauma you suffered.
translation.de: Das Trauma, das du erlitten hast.

translation.en: Don't you think they'd want me to help you, sweetheart?
translation.de: Denkst du nicht, sie wollen, dass ich dir helfe, Süße?

translation.en: -[gasps] -Stop calling me that. You're a liar.
translation.de: Hören Sie auf, mich so zu nennen! Sie Lügnerin.

translation.en: You were with BioPrime even then.
translation.de: Sie machten damals schon gemeinsame Sache mit BioPrime.

translation.en: You helped them take away
translation.de: Sie halfen ihnen bei der Rücknahme

translation.en: a cheap and lifesaving medication for my mom.
translation.de: eines billigen und lebensrettenden Medikaments für meine Mom.

translation.en: I fought against them! [panting]
You took their bribe, and you gave them exclusive contracts.
translation.de: Sie nahmen das Bestechungsgeld und verhalfen zu Exklusivverträgen.

translation.en: You're responsible for ordering the hit on Martin Bennett.
translation.de: Sie veranlassten die Ermordung von Martin Bennett.

translation.en: You killed my dad. [softly] Now tell the truth.
translation.de: Sie haben meinen Dad getötet. Ich will die Wahrheit.

translation.en: -[Morgan gasps] -[firmly] Tell me the truth.
Yeah.
I took the bribe.
I ordered the hit.
You don't understand anything. You're so young.
translation.de: Du verstehst gar nichts. Du bist noch jung.

translation.en: The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.de: Der Kandidat mit dem meisten Geld gewinnt.

translation.en: That's how it works.
Was it worth it?
Was it worth it?
Security?
[yelling] Security!
She kills Keeley and runs. Tries to escape, but something or someone
translation.de: Sie tötet Keeley und will flüchten. Irgendetwas oder jemand holte sie zurück,

translation.en: drove her back here, despite knowing she might be caught.
translation.de: Sie tötet Keeley und will flüchten. Irgendetwas oder jemand holte sie zurück, -obwohl sie gefasst werden könnte. -Sie hat ihre Rache. Warum zurück?

translation.en: [Rothman] Yeah, but she got her revenge. Why come back?
translation.de: -obwohl sie gefasst werden könnte. -Sie hat ihre Rache. Warum zurück?

translation.en: -[agent] Just came in. -Thank you, sir.
-Holy shit. -[Meeker] What?
[Rothman] Rachel Cooper was spotted at Diana Morgan's campaign rally yesterday afternoon.
translation.de: Rachel Cooper war gestern Nachmittag bei Diana Morgans Wahlkampfkundgebung.

translation.en: [Meeker] What was she doing there?
[reporter on TV] The fugitive from last night's assassination attempt…
translation.de: Die Flüchtige vom Mordanschlag von gestern Abend…

translation.en: [Rachel] Thanks.
…on Diana Morgan is still on the loose.
Pittsburgh police are asking anyone with information to please come forward.
translation.de: Die Polizei bittet jeden mit Informationen, sich zu melden.

translation.en: [Rothman] First Keeley, then Shah, now a congresswoman?
translation.de: Erst Keeley, dann Shah, jetzt eine Abgeordnete?

translation.en: It just seems so bizarre.
[Meeker] Rachel clearly knows something.
Let's go through Diana Morgan's campaign donations.
translation.de: Sehen wir uns Diana Morgans Spenden an.

translation.en: [Meeker] Look at this. Rachel Cooper just sent us something.
translation.de: Sieh dir das an. Rachel Cooper hat uns etwas geschickt.

translation.en: [Morgan on recording] I took the bribe. I ordered the hit.
translation.de: Ich nahm das Geld an. Ich veranlasste den Mord.

translation.en: The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.de: Der Kandidat mit dem meisten Geld gewinnt.

translation.en: That's how it works.
[reporter on TV] …developments in the assassination attempt.
According to sources, the FBI has arrested the congresswoman
translation.de: Laut Quellen verhaftete das FBI die Kongressabgeordnete

translation.en: regarding her connection to the recent murders of BioPrime executives
translation.de: in Verbindung mit den Morden an den BioPrime-Bossen

translation.en: Simon Keeley and Vinod Shah
and the two-year-old unsolved murders of Martin Bennett and Ray Cooper.
translation.de: und den zwei Jahre alten ungeklärten Morden an Martin Bennett und Ray Cooper.

translation.en: Neither BioPrime or the FBI would comment on this ongoing investigation.
translation.de: Weder BioPrime noch das FBI kommentieren die laufende Ermittlung.

translation.en: …Pennsylvania is allegedly connected to the deaths of reporter Martin Bennett
translation.de: …steht angeblich in Verbindung mit dem Tod von Reporter Martin Bennett

translation.en: and Rachel Cooper's father nearly two years ago.
translation.de: und Rachel Coopers Vater vor fast zwei Jahren.

translation.en: [Ray] The past is like a dream.
translation.de: Die Vergangenheit ist wie ein Traum.

translation.en: A mosaic of images and feelings
translation.de: Ein Mosaik aus Bildern und Gefühlen,

translation.en: that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.de: die etwas Wahrheit bieten, wieso wir hier sind.

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
translation.de: Auch wenn Details mit der Zeit verblassen.

translation.en: Parents and their children.
Where do we stop…
[Rachel] …and they begin?
